name: Monty
tagline: A modern, easily deployable monitoring agent
body:
### Monty
A new type of monitoring; customize your Monty agents to be simple and light, or elegant and powerful. Monty agents can be managed independently, configured remotely or locally, and can even communicate to external API's, like to a SecureLink [Gatekeeper](http://www.securelink.com/products/gatekeeper).

### Authors and Contributors
A [SecureLink](http://www.securelink.com) Labs Business

### Support or Contact
If you have any questions please contact admin@monty.io
